Title: Chairman Mao during the Great Production Movement
Designer: Zhang Ziyi (张自疑)Cai Liang (蔡亮)Chen Beixin (谌北心)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: The "Great Production Movement" started in 1939. Its goal was to make the liberated areas self-sufficient, partly in response to the Guomindang blockade.
